title: Cucumber and Queso Fresco Salad
source: Bricia Lopez, Javier Cabral - Asada: The Art of Mexican-Style Grilling
categories: Asada: The Art of Mexican-Style Grilling
ingredients: ¼cup (105 g) Pickled Red Onions (this page; can substitute raw onions soaked in water)
¾cup (30 g) finely chopped fresh cilantro
1½pounds (680 g) Persian cucumbers, cut into 1-inch (2.5 cm) slices
directions: In a large bowl, toss the pickled onions with the chile and the cilantro. Add the cucumbers and queso fresco. Toss and season with the key lime juice and sea salt. Let rest in the refrigerator and serve cold.
